languages.text: {n}Ксенос склоняет голову набок и смотрит на Ирлиэт с притворной жалостью.{/n} "И это говорит та, что добровольно заперла себя в клетке правил и запретов. Что в тебе от истинного эльдара, Азуриани? Ты хотя бы раз в жизни позволяла себе быть захлестнутой подлинной эйфорией? Почувствовать настоящую страсть? Так иди же ко мне — я посвящу тебя в искусство боли и открою тебе то, что скрывают ваши Пути".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос склоняет голову набок и смотрит на Ирлиэт с притворной жалостью.{/n} "И это говорит та, что добровольно заперла себя в клетке правил и запретов. Что в тебе от истинного эльдара, Асурьян? Ты хотя бы раз в жизни позволяла себе быть захлестнутой подлинной эйфорией? Почувствовать настоящую страсть? Так иди же ко мне — я посвящу тебя в искусство боли и открою тебе то, что скрывают ваши Пути".

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос склоняет голову набок и смотрит на Ирлиэт с притворной жалостью.{/n} "И это говорит та, что добровольно заперла себя в клетке правил и запретов. languages.text: {n}黑暗灵族歪着头，故作同情地看着伊莉耶特。{/n}“是啊，甘愿把自己锁在规则与禁忌的牢笼中的人，确实会这么说。告诉我，方舟灵族，你身上究竟哪部分像真正的艾达灵族了？在你的一生之中，你可曾让自己被纯粹的兴奋所吞噬？你可曾感受过真正的激情？我邀请你来到我身边。我会带领你感受痛苦的艺术，揭开你的道途隐瞒的一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗灵族歪着头，故作同情地看着伊莉耶特。{/n}“是啊，甘愿把自己锁在规则与禁忌的牢笼中的人，确实会这么说。告诉我，方舟灵族，你身上究竟哪部分像真正的艾达灵族了？在你的一生之中，你可曾让自己被纯粹的兴奋所吞噬？你可曾感受过真正的激情？我邀请你来到我身边。我会带领你感受痛苦的艺术，揭开你的道途隐瞒的一切。”

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari ladea la cabeza y mira a Yrliet con una lástima fingida.{/n} «Eso dice la que se ha encerrado voluntariamente en una jaula de reglas y tabúes. Dime, Asuryani: ¿qué te queda de los verdaderos Aeldari? ¿Has dejado alguna vez en tu vida que te consumiera la euforia? ¿Has sentido auténtica pasión? Te invito a unirte a mí. Te iniciaré en el arte del dolor y desvelaré todo aquello que tus Sendas ocultan».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."

Dime, Asuryani: ¿qué te queda de los verdaderos Aeldari? ¿Has dejado alguna vez en tu vida que te consumiera la euforia? ¿Has sentido auténtica pasión? Te invito a unirte a mí. Te iniciaré en el arte del dolor y desvelaré todo aquello que tus Sendas ocultan».

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは首をかしげてユリエットをわざと哀れみの目で見つめる。{/n}「ルールとタブーの鳥かごに自ら捕われる者の言うことだな。教えろよ、アシュリヤーニ。お前のどこが真のアエルダリなんだ？これまで生きてきて高揚感を消費したことはないのか？真の情熱を感じたことは？俺の仲間になれよ。苦痛という芸術を手ほどきして、お前の道に隠されたすべてを暴いてやるからさ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."

languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari penche la tête sur le côté et lance à Yrliet un regard de fausse pitié.{/n} « Dit celle qui s'est enfermée de plein gré dans un carcan de règles et de tabous. Dites-moi, Asuryani : en quelle proportion êtes-vous réellement une Aeldari ? Vous êtes-vous déjà laissé consumer par l'euphorie pure ? Avez-vous déjà ressenti la vraie passion ? Je vous propose de vous joindre à moi. Je vous initierai à l'art de la douleur et vous dévoilerai tout ce que cachent vos Voies. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari penche la tête sur le côté et lance à Yrliet un regard de fausse pitié.{/n} « Dit celle qui s'est enfermée de plein gré dans un carcan de règles et de tabous. Dites-moi, Asuryani : en quelle proportion êtes-vous réellement une Aeldari ? Vous êtes-vous déjà laissé consumer par l'euphorie pure ? Avez-vous déjà ressenti la vraie passion ? Je vous propose de vous joindre à moi. Je vous initierai à l'art de la douleur et vous dévoilerai tout ce que cachent vos Voies. »

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari legt den Kopf schief und sieht Yrliet mit gespieltem Mitleid an.{/n} "Sagt ausgerechnet jemand, der sich freiwillig in einem Käfig aus Regeln und Tabus eingesperrt hat. Sagt mir, Asuryani: Welcher Teil von Euch ist eine echte Aeldari? Habt Ihr Euch in Eurem Leben jemals reiner Euphorie hingegeben? Habt Ihr jemals echte Leidenschaft empfunden? Ich lade Euch ein, Euch mir anzuschließen. Ich werde Euch in die Kunst des Schmerzes einführen und alles enthüllen, was Eure Pfade verbergen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari legt den Kopf schief und sieht Yrliet mit gespieltem Mitleid an.{/n} "Sagt ausgerechnet jemand, der sich freiwillig in einem Käfig aus Regeln und Tabus eingesperrt hat. Sagt mir, Asuryani: Welcher Teil von Euch ist eine echte Aeldari? Habt Ihr Euch in Eurem Leben jemals reiner Euphorie hingegeben? Habt Ihr jemals echte Leidenschaft empfunden? Ich lade Euch ein, Euch mir anzuschließen. Ich werde Euch in die Kunst des Schmerzes einführen und alles enthüllen, was Eure Pfade verbergen."

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, kafasını kaldırıp sahte bir acımayla Yrliet'e bakıyor.{/n} "Kendini kurallar ve yasaklarla dolu bir kafese kapatan kişi mi söylüyor bunu?. Söylesene ey Asuryani: Kendine hakikaten Aeldari diyebilir misin? Ömrühayatında kendini kaybedecek derecede mest oldun mu hiç? Tutkuyu iliklerine kadar hissettin mi? Gel bana katıl. Seni ızdırap sanatıyla tanıştırayım, Yollarının gizli tuttuğu her şeyi açığa çıkarayım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari cocks his head and looks at Yrliet with feigned pity.{/n} "Spoken by one who has willingly locked herself in a cage of rules and taboos. Tell me, Asuryani: what part of you is true Aeldari? Have you ever in your life let yourself be consumed by pure euphoria? Have you ever felt real passion? I invite you to join me. I will initiate you into the art of pain and unveil all that your Paths keep hidden."
